it.polimi.ma.group10.trump.model.game

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ma.group10.trump.model.game.Player
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PlayerAI

    public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    The Player acts as a normal player in a real match: it can play a card in his hand; it holds the pile of won cards.

      • Player

        public Player(int id,
              java.lang.String hand,
              java.lang.String pile)
       throws CardException,
              PlayerException
        The constructor of a player starting from a known configuration
        Parameters:
        id - it's id
        hand - the cards in his hand
        pile - the cards won up to now
        Throws:
        CardException - if the cards won or in the hand are invalid
        PlayerException - if the known configuration is invalid
